metadata.title: CVE-2018-14642 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An information leak vulnerability was found in Undertow. If all headers arenot written out in the first write() call then the code that handlesflushing the buffer will always write out the full contents of thewritevBuffer buffer, which may contain data from previous requests.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
